dcterms:creator: K. Ito
L. Johnson
dcterms:description: The LJ Speech dataset consists of 13,100 short audio clips of a single speaker reading passages from 7 non-fiction books. A transcription is provided for each clip. The length of each clip varies from 1 to 10 seconds, and the total length is approximately 24 hours.
dcterms:title: LJ Speech

dcterms:creator: H. Zen
V. Dang
R. Clark
dcterms:description: The LibriTTS dataset is a multi-speaker English corpus of approximately 585 hours of read English speech at 24kHz sampling rate. It is derived from the original materials of the LibriSpeech corpus.
dcterms:title: LibriTTS

dcterms:creator: C. Veaux
J. Yamagishi
K. MacDonald
dcterms:description: The VCTK corpus includes speech data uttered by 110 English speakers with various accents. Each speaker reads out about 400 sentences selected from a newspaper.
dcterms:title: VCTK
